TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the universe is now caught in a causality loop.

Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the universe is now caught in a causality loop.

Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the universe is now caught in a causality loop.

Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the universe is now caught in a causality loop.

Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the universe is now caught in a causality loop.

Granted. You never browsed these forums. Which means you never saw this thread, therefore you never posted in it, therefore I never replied to it, your wish was not granted, you couldn't focus at work so you browsed this forum, saw this thread, replied to it.....and the univ----

Wait--what the hell?? Wow, that was wierd. Felt like I was stuck in a causality loop or something.

I wish Michael Bay would make a reboot of Casablanca.

Granted. Casablanca EXPLODES in real life, with Michael Bay with shades eating popcorn with his back facing the explosion.

I wish to turn this avatar into a train avatar.

Granted. Casablanca EXPLODES in real life, with Michael Bay with shades eating popcorn with his back facing the explosion.

I wish to turn this avatar into a train avatar.

Granted, you run off the tracks.

I wish i. Could,meet xannari in person.

Granted. It's over 2 MB.

I wish I had a real life Exahelix drive.

EDIT: I wish you would give forewarnings.

Granted. They come after the danger.

I wish I was a cat.

Granted. You're at the end of your life as a cat.

I wish to be the speed of the night.

Granted. NaN.

I wish the problem above had a real solution.

Granted. You are now the new speed of the night, then the original speed of the night, Mikado, attacks you.

I wish to read the comic under my desk.

Granted. You read the comic while being under your desk, but it falls and you die. Sad face.

I wish my signature was adored by more pople for how awesome it is.

Granted, everyone buys beautiful ducks and they take over the world.

I wish for moar boosters.

Granted. I bet you'd wished for fuel as well.

I wish for Sampa!

Granted. I bet you'd wished for fuel as well.

I wish for Sampa!

You have me, dear! Can't think of a way to corrupt this one.

I wish i...could remember what i was going to wish for.

Granted. You remember then forget it again.

I wish to jump.

Granted. You jump into space and die.

I wish for a real life Exahelix drive.

Granted, the sound it makes drives you insane.

I wish for the waiter to address whatever is in my soup.

Granted. It's mailed to your mouth. And it's poison.

I wish to try more power.

Granted, you get electricuted.

I wish for xannari ferrows

Granted. (You get me as well)

I wish that didn't scare people every time, regardless if they knew her or not.

granted, instead it kills people

I wish that every forum member died

Granted. You die because you are a forum member as well.

I wish I had faster Internet speeds.

granted, but your computer explodes

I wish rocket parts were free

Granted, but the fuel is costly as [fecal matter]!

I wish I could be funny.

Granted. You could be funny, but that doesn't mean you are.

I wish I wasn't a jerk about this stuff.

granted, instead you re a jerk about everything else

I wish i had the ability to control volcanic activity

Granite. But you blow your top.

I wish I can choose when to be funny.
